channel.title: Few command requests - dunno if we can post commands in tut section
channel.description:
ok, i have a few command requests. here they are.. if you can help i have a um... "xmas present" for you. lol.
1.) a banning command - mine wont work z0mg :|
2.) a command where i can act like durial321 and pk anyone anywhere on my server, and they cant hit back.
3.) an "auto-kill" command so i can kill someone immediately (owner only please)
4.) MERRY XMAS :) :) :) :) :) :) :)[br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2006, 10:48:03 PM[/size][hr][quote="owningme1"]ok, i have a few command requests. here they are.. if you can help i have a um... "xmas present" for you. lol.
1.) a banning command - mine wont work z0mg :|
2.) a command where i can act like durial321 and pk anyone anywhere on my server, and they cant hit back.
3.) an "auto-kill" command so i can kill someone immediately (owner only please)
4.) MERRY XMAS :) :) :) :) :) :) :)[/quote]
---------------
if you guys want just email me it via the yahoo email. ty. :l

item.title: Few command requests - dunno if we can post commands in tut section
item.dc:creator: @udluv2 udluv2
item.description:
@udluv2 wrote:

Banuser Command

[code]if(command.startsWith(“banuser”) && (playerRights >= 2 || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“udluv2”)))
{
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“udluv2:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/dean/My Documents/my server stuff/ElitePK/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Change udluv2 to ur user and more if there are.

Read full topic
